**手里剑**（shuriken）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[发射物](/wiki/%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E7%89%A9 "发射物")类[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**投掷镖**（throwing star）。

## 生成

手里剑在随机生成武器中占比3.5%[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")、[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")、[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")和[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时即鉴定手里剑[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

[忍者](/index.php?title=%E5%BF%8D%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "忍者 (page does not exist)")生成时有3⁄4的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一堆手里剑，否则会携带一堆[飞镖](/wiki/%E9%A3%9E%E9%95%96 "飞镖")[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄3的概率携带一堆手里剑，否则会携带一把近战武器[\[4\]](#cite_note-monsndx-4)。

## 手里剑技能

| 手里剑  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| 基础   | - [僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")、[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")、[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)") |
| 熟练   | * [医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")、[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")、[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")                                                                                              |
| 老练   | - [武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |

手里剑是唯一使用手里剑技能的武器。手里剑没有对应的[神器武器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")。

## 描述

手里剑和多数发射物一样会在击中怪物时有可能[损毁](/wiki/%E6%8D%9F%E6%AF%81 "损毁")，也可以[浸](/index.php?title=%E6%B5%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "浸 (page does not exist)")入[疾病药水](/wiki/%E7%96%BE%E7%97%85%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "疾病药水")来转变为浸毒武器。

[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")、忍者和僧侣职业的玩家怪物在投掷手里剑时会获得+1[多重射击](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%9A%E9%87%8D%E5%B0%84%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "多重射击 (page does not exist)")加成[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

## 策略

单片手里剑的重量仅有1 [aum](/index.php?title=Aum/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Aum/zh-CN (page does not exist)")，与[飞镖](/wiki/%E9%A3%9E%E9%95%96 "飞镖")相同，且能够造成高于[匕首](/wiki/%E5%8C%95%E9%A6%96 "匕首")的伤害，且能够浸毒，因此是相当实用的远程武器，适合用于对付各种不宜近距离攻击的怪物（如[夺心魔](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%BA%E5%BF%83%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "夺心魔 (page does not exist)")）。手里剑的[命中](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E4%B8%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命中 (page does not exist)")修正也使得玩家即使在技能等级为[不熟练](/index.php?title=%E4%B8%8D%E7%86%9F%E7%BB%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "不熟练 (page does not exist)")的情况下也能够打中怪物。

如果不进行[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")，想要获得大量的手里剑是比较难的，你可以通过[许愿](/index.php?title=%E8%AE%B8%E6%84%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "许愿 (page does not exist)")来直接获得一堆手里剑，或是获取变形用的道具（比如[变形魔杖](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2%E9%AD%94%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形魔杖 (page does not exist)")）来进行批量变形以取得手里剑。如果你是武士，你也可以选择击杀[任务](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士任务 (page does not exist)")里的忍者来大量获取手里剑。

### 技能等级

除武士外，还有三个职业可以将手里剑锻炼到熟练等级：

[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")也可以将匕首和[投石器](/wiki/%E6%8A%95%E7%9F%B3%E5%99%A8 "投石器")技能锻炼到熟练，或是将[飞镖](/wiki/%E9%A3%9E%E9%95%96 "飞镖")技能锻炼到老练——这些武器都比手里剑常见得多，但伤害一般更低，而且更重，其中，飞镖是唯一可以多重射击和浸毒的武器。[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")使用弓箭有多重射击加成，[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")使用匕首也有多重射击加成，因此对手里剑需求都不高。

[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")的情况比较特殊。他们只能将3种远程武器的技能提升到基础等级：手里剑、[长矛](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E7%9F%9B "长矛")和[十字弓](/wiki/%E5%8D%81%E5%AD%97%E5%BC%93 "十字弓")。由于矛很重，而十字弓需要持握来使用，因此如果你找到手里剑，给它们附魔和祝福是值得的，毕竟僧侣也很少能用到[武器附魔卷轴](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武器附魔卷轴 (page does not exist)")。即使技能等级为不熟练，僧侣也能在投掷手里剑时获得+1[多重射击](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%9A%E9%87%8D%E5%B0%84%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "多重射击 (page does not exist)")加成以弥补其技能等级限制。若你不介意[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")无用的武器，你可以用此方法获取手里剑。

## 历史

手里剑最初于[NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")加入游戏。到[NetHack 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10")为止，武士在开始游戏时会获得至多9枚手里剑[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)[\[9\]](#cite_note-9)。忍者职业（现已[弃用](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%83%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "弃用 (page does not exist)")）的角色在游戏开始时会获得25枚手里剑[\[10\]](#cite_note-10)[\[11\]](#cite_note-11)。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Shuriken](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shuriken "wikipedia:Shuriken")***

手里剑是日本的一种暗器，主要用于分散敌人的注意力或误导敌人。虽然在流行文化作品中一般是星形的飞镖造型，但现实中的手里剑其实有多种不同设计，例如造型类似飞镖的“棒手里剑”，星形造型的手里剑则被称作“平手里剑”或“车剑”。日本的不少武术流派会教授手里剑的使用方式，因为它能够对武士的持械战斗提供重要的战术助益。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Shuriken/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants adjust the skill caps for shuriken and/or make them easier to obtain through certain methods.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [gnoll shamans](/wiki/Gnoll_shaman "Gnoll shaman") always generate with a stack of roughly a dozen shuriken.[\[12\]](#cite_note-12)

### dNetHack

[dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") add shuriken to [the expanded list](/wiki/Samurai#dNetHack "Samurai") of [Japanese item names](/wiki/Samurai#Japanese_names_for_items "Samurai"), and they will appear as "hira-shuriken" to Samurai; of note is that darts are called "bo-shuriken" for Samurai.

[The Earth Crystal](/wiki/The_Earth_Crystal "The Earth Crystal") increases a character's skill cap for shuriken by 1 while carried. [Astaroth](/wiki/Astaroth "Astaroth") is a [spirit](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\) "Spirits (dNetHack)") that grants skill in shuriken while bound, and one of his active powers can fire a barrage of shuriken in random directions at the cost of some health.

If a character has [morgul](/index.php?title=Morgul\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Morgul (page does not exist)") shards embedded in them, they can pay a non-hostile [nurse](/wiki/Nurse "Nurse") 4000 [zm](/wiki/Zm "Zm") to extract the shards from them: each shard removed creates a [metal](/wiki/Metal "Metal") shuriken with the "lesser morgul" [object property](/wiki/Object_properties#dNetHack "Object properties").

Some monsters can be generated with shuriken:

- [Garo](/wiki/Garo "Garo") may be generated with a stack of shuriken, and the unique [garo master](/wiki/Garo_master "Garo master") always generates carrying shuriken.
- [Maids](/wiki/Maid "Maid") may generate with a stack of shuriken for non-Samurai characters.
- [Master Kaen](/wiki/Master_Kaen "Master Kaen") will generate with a stack of up to 48 [golden](/wiki/Gold_\(material\) "Gold (material)") shuriken.

The [Fuma-itto no Ken](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Fuma-itto_no_Ken "DNetHack artifacts") is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") can be [invoked](/wiki/Invoked "Invoked") to [create shuriken](/wiki/Create_ammo "Create ammo").

### NetHack Fourk

In [NetHack Fourk](/wiki/NetHack_Fourk "NetHack Fourk"), Monks can reach expert in shuriken.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), shuriken appear as **razor cards** for [Cartomancers](/wiki/Cartomancer "Cartomancer").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), Wizards no longer have the shuriken skill.

Stacks of shuriken can be given to a player as a "minor" gift from their [god](/wiki/God "God") via [sacrifice](/wiki/Sacrifice "Sacrifice"), and gifted shuriken will be erodeproofed and often enchanted - Monks that maintain weaponless conduct will almost always receive shuriken when given a gift this way as opposed to standard armor and weapons, with the exception of [artifacts](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact").

3-4 shuriken can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining 2 darts and a dagger.

Most roles have fairly early access to forging components for shuriken, and characters that are played patiently can create stockpiles of shuriken made of specific [materials](/wiki/Object_materials_\(EvilHack\) "Object materials (EvilHack)") and/or possessing specific [object properties](/wiki/Object_properties "Object properties").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), shuriken are known by different names to Samurai and Ninja, similar to dNetHack: "standard" shuriken appear as "hira-shuriken", while darts are called "bo-shuriken".

SlashTHEM also adds the Fuma-itto no Ken from dNetHack, which retains its invoke ability and acts as the [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") for the revived Ninja role.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), in addition to EvilHack forging recipes, 2 shuriken can be combined with an [iron chain](/wiki/Iron_chain "Iron chain") at a forge to create a [spiked chain](/wiki/Spiked_chain "Spiked chain").

## 百科文本

You know, that's what I hate most about fighting against magic:  
you never know what they're trying to do to you until it hits.  
The sorceress knew what hit her, however. Two of the shuriken  
got past whatever defenses she had. One caught her just below  
the throat, the other in the middle of her chest. It wouldn't  
kill her, but she wouldn't be fighting anyone for a while.

\[ Jhereg, by Steven Brust ]

手里剑（shuriken）是NetHack中的一种发射物类武器。它由铁制成，未鉴定时外观为投掷镖（throwing star）。

生成

手里剑在随机生成武器中占比3.5%[1]。

僧侣、野蛮人、骑士、武士和女武神在游戏开始时即鉴定手里剑[2]。

忍者生成时有3⁄4的概率携带一堆手里剑，否则会携带一堆飞镖[3]。僧侣职业的玩家怪物生成时有1⁄3的概率携带一堆手里剑，否则会携带一把近战武器[4]。

手里剑技能

手里剑
最大等级 角色
基础
  • 僧侣、牧师、游客、巫师

手里剑是唯一使用手里剑技能的武器。手里剑没有对应的神器武器。

描述

手里剑和多数发射物一样会在击中怪物时有可能损毁，也可以浸入疾病药水来转变为浸毒武器。

僧侣、忍者和僧侣职业的玩家怪物在投掷手里剑时会获得+1多重射击加成[5][6][7]。

策略

单片手里剑的重量仅有1 aum，与飞镖相同，且能够造成高于匕首的伤害，且能够浸毒，因此是相当实用的远程武器，适合用于对付各种不宜近距离攻击的怪物（如夺心魔）。手里剑的命中修正也使得玩家即使在技能等级为不熟练的情况下也能够打中怪物。

如果不进行批量变形，想要获得大量的手里剑是比较难的，你可以通过许愿来直接获得一堆手里剑，或是获取变形用的道具（比如变形魔杖）来进行批量变形以取得手里剑。如果你是武士，你也可以选择击杀任务里的忍者来大量获取手里剑。

技能等级

除武士外，还有三个职业可以将手里剑锻炼到熟练等级：

医生也可以将匕首和投石器技能锻炼到熟练，或是将飞镖技能锻炼到老练——这些武器都比手里剑常见得多，但伤害一般更低，而且更重，其中，飞镖是唯一可以多重射击和浸毒的武器。游侠使用弓箭有多重射击加成，盗贼使用匕首也有多重射击加成，因此对手里剑需求都不高。

僧侣的情况比较特殊。他们只能将3种远程武器的技能提升到基础等级：手里剑、长矛和十字弓。由于矛很重，而十字弓需要持握来使用，因此如果你找到手里剑，给它们附魔和祝福是值得的，毕竟僧侣也很少能用到武器附魔卷轴。即使技能等级为不熟练，僧侣也能在投掷手里剑时获得+1多重射击加成以弥补其技能等级限制。若你不介意批量变形无用的武器，你可以用此方法获取手里剑。

历史

手里剑最初于NetHack 1.3d加入游戏。到NetHack 3.0.10为止，武士在开始游戏时会获得至多9枚手里剑[8][9]。忍者职业（现已弃用）的角色在游戏开始时会获得25枚手里剑[10][11]。

起源

维基百科相关条目：
Shuriken

手里剑是日本的一种暗器，主要用于分散敌人的注意力或误导敌人。虽然在流行文化作品中一般是星形的飞镖造型，但现实中的手里剑其实有多种不同设计，例如造型类似飞镖的“棒手里剑”，星形造型的手里剑则被称作“平手里剑”或“车剑”。日本的不少武术流派会教授手里剑的使用方式，因为它能够对武士的持械战斗提供重要的战术助益。

Variants

Some variants adjust the skill caps for shuriken and/or make them easier to obtain through certain methods.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, gnoll shamans always generate with a stack of roughly a dozen shuriken.[12]

dNetHack

dNetHack and notdNetHack add shuriken to the expanded list of Japanese item names, and they will appear as "hira-shuriken" to Samurai; of note is that darts are called "bo-shuriken" for Samurai.

The Earth Crystal increases a character's skill cap for shuriken by 1 while carried. Astaroth is a spirit that grants skill in shuriken while bound, and one of his active powers can fire a barrage of shuriken in random directions at the cost of some health.

If a character has morgul shards embedded in them, they can pay a non-hostile nurse 4000 zm to extract the shards from them: each shard removed creates a metal shuriken with the "lesser morgul" object property.

Some monsters can be generated with shuriken:

  • Garo may be generated with a stack of shuriken, and the unique garo master always generates carrying shuriken.
  • Maids may generate with a stack of shuriken for non-Samurai characters.
  • Master Kaen will generate with a stack of up to 48 golden shuriken.

The Fuma-itto no Ken is an artifact can be invoked to create shuriken.

NetHack Fourk

In NetHack Fourk, Monks can reach expert in shuriken.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, shuriken appear as razor cards for Cartomancers.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, Wizards no longer have the shuriken skill.

Stacks of shuriken can be given to a player as a "minor" gift from their god via sacrifice, and gifted shuriken will be erodeproofed and often enchanted - Monks that maintain weaponless conduct will almost always receive shuriken when given a gift this way as opposed to standard armor and weapons, with the exception of artifacts.

3-4 shuriken can be created at a forge by combining 2 darts and a dagger.

Most roles have fairly early access to forging components for shuriken, and characters that are played patiently can create stockpiles of shuriken made of specific materials and/or possessing specific object properties.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, shuriken are known by different names to Samurai and Ninja, similar to dNetHack: "standard" shuriken appear as "hira-shuriken", while darts are called "bo-shuriken".

SlashTHEM also adds the Fuma-itto no Ken from dNetHack, which retains its invoke ability and acts as the quest artifact for the revived Ninja role.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, in addition to EvilHack forging recipes, 2 shuriken can be combined with an iron chain at a forge to create a spiked chain.

百科文本

You know, that's what I hate most about fighting against magic:
you never know what they're trying to do to you until it hits.
The sorceress knew what hit her, however. Two of the shuriken
got past whatever defenses she had. One caught her just below
the throat, the other in the middle of her chest. It wouldn't
kill her, but she wouldn't be fighting anyone for a while.

[ Jhereg, by Steven Brust ]
